signin_to_dashboard: Sign in to access your dashboard
join_to_analyze: Join to start analyzing your crops
project_report_description: A technical overview of the AgriVisionAI application, its features, and the technology stack.
start_analysis_desc: Upload a plant image and adjust the controls in the sidebar to begin.
awaiting_analysis_desc: Click the 'Analyze Harvest' button in the sidebar to process this image.
analyzed_image_summary: Analyzed the image and found {{count}} detections.
total_forecasted_desc: Total planned harvest in the next {{days}} days.
ready_harvest_forecast_desc: Projected cumulative harvestable yield over the next {{days}} days.
harvest_plan_desc: Optimized daily harvest schedule based on capacity.
no_harvest_in_period: No harvest scheduled in this period.
run_analysis_to_see_forecast: Run an analysis to see the harvest forecast.
market_forecast_desc: Forecast future market prices to maximize profit.
price_forecast_chart_desc: Projected prices for {{district}} over the next {{days}} days.
run_forecast_to_see_trends: Run a forecast to see price trends.
no_price_data_desc: Fill out the form and run a forecast to see market price predictions.
ai_assistant_desc: Ask me anything about your analysis, forecast, or market prices. I'm here to help you gain insights from your data.
ask_about_yield: Ask about your yield, forecast, or market price...
total_exp_yield_desc: Total estimated yield over the full growth cycle.
forecast_confidence_desc: AI model's confidence in this forecast.
ai_reasoning_desc: How the AI arrived at this forecast.
no_yield_data_desc: Run a plant analysis first, then click 'Run Yield Forecast'.
